mutants.code:
def find_dependencies(n, projects, dependencies):
    project_to_index = {}
    index_to_project = []
    g = 1
    for project in projects:
        (name, version) = project
        key = f'{name} {version}'
        if key not in project_to_index:
            project_to_index[key] = g
            index_to_project.append(key)
            g += 1
    graph = [[] for _ in range(g)]
    for (i, project) in enumerate(projects):
        (name, version) = project
        key = f'{name} {version}'
        for (dep_name, dep_version) in dependencies[i]:
            dep_key = f'{dep_name} {dep_version}'
            if dep_key not in project_to_index:
                project_to_index[dep_key] = g
                index_to_project.append(dep_key)
                g += 1
            graph[project_to_index[key]].append(project_to_index[dep_key])
    queue = [0]
    seen_projects = set()
    result = []
    while queue:
        current_index = queue.pop(0)
        current_project = index_to_project[current_index]
        (name, version) = current_project.split()
        if name in seen_projects:
            continue
        seen_projects.add(name)
        result.append((name, int(version)))
        for neighbor_index in graph[current_index]:
            queue.append(neighbor_index)
    result = result[1:]
    result.sort()
    return result

    queue = [0]
    seen_projects = set()
    result = []
    while queue:
        current_index = queue.pop(-1)
        current_project = index_to_project[current_index]
        (name, version) = current_project.split()
        if name in seen_projects:
            continue
        seen_projects.add(name)
        result.append((name, int(version)))
        for neighbor_index in graph[current_index]:
            queue.append(neighbor_index)
    result = result[1:]
    result.sort()
    return result
